remarks: A linear subspace of a module is a subset which is a module in its own right.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement:
islss3.x $e |- X = ( W |`s U ) $.
islss3.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
islss3.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
islss3 $p |- ( W e. LMod -> ( U e. S <-> ( U C_ V /\ X e. LMod ) ) ) $.
